events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I bought last week. It does not fit and I want my money back.
The customer issue has been categorized under the refund cluster based on keywords indicating a refund request.
The case has been assigned to support agent Mark Thompson for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and whether the jacket was used or returned in its original packaging?
My order number is 7894523. The jacket is unused and still has all tags attached in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund process immediately and you should receive the amount back within 5 business days.
Great! I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please allow up to 5 business days for the transaction to appear on your statement.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory now.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Thank you for your assistance and professional handling of my request.
We are glad your refund has been received. Closing this case now, and don’t hesitate to contact us again in the future.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback about your experience with our refund process.
